name: iBriscola
description:
From the developers of iScopa.

15 years of experience in Mobile games.
15 years of fun!

With iBriscola you can play the famous Italian card game Briscola on your Smartphone, against a well trained artificial intelligence or against another player.

15 Italian traditional regional cards by MODIANO:
- Napoletane
- Piacentine
- Toscane
- Bergamasche
- Lombarde
- Trentine
- Trevigiane
- Triestine
- Piemontesi
- Siciliane
- Genovesi
- Romagnole
- Sarde
- Poker
- Salzburger

***
Contact info: info@doclouisjones.com, www.doclouisjones.com
